markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 9"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Shory Aeromancer](/Feats.aspx?ID=955) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Human" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=90" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Character Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=12) pg. 14 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
Garundi ethnicity, Mauxi ethnicity, or Tian-Yae ethnicity

</column>

---

Your ancestors hailed from the flying cities of the Shory, and a few simple tricks have come down through the ages to you. You can cast 4th-level [_fly_](/Spells.aspx?ID=125) on yourself as an innate arcane spell once per day.

<title level="2">Shory Aeromancer leads to...</title>
[Shory Aerialist](/Feats.aspx?ID=959)
name: Shory Aeromancer
prerequisite: Garundi ethnicity, Mauxi ethnicity, or Tian-Yae ethnicity
prerequisite_markdown: Garundi ethnicity, Mauxi ethnicity, or Tian-Yae ethnicity
